MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: M.K. is a shareholder in Quadrant Health Economics Inc., which was contracted by Moderna, Inc. to conduct this study. E.B., Y.H., K.J. and N.v.d.V. are employed by Moderna, Inc. and hold stock/stock options in the company. A.I. has received honorarium or research consultation fees from Moderna Inc., Pfizer Inc., Takeda Pharmaceuticals Inc., Shionogi Co., Ltd., and AstraZeneca Japan Inc.
